ROOT:
-- DaoT_Workflow_D2_Select -- 2014/7/4 日立 太郎 SELECT [WorkflowControlNo], [SubSystemId], [WorkflowName], [UserId], [UserInfo], [ReserveArea], [CreatedDate], [EndDate] FROM [T_Workflow]
WHERE AND [WorkflowControlNo] = @WorkflowControlNoAND [WorkflowControlNo] IS NULL AND [WorkflowControlNo] LIKE @WorkflowControlNo_Like AND [SubSystemId] = @SubSystemIdAND [SubSystemId] IS NULL AND [SubSystemId] LIKE @SubSystemId_Like AND [WorkflowName] = @WorkflowNameAND [WorkflowName] IS NULL AND [WorkflowName] LIKE @WorkflowName_Like AND [UserId] = @UserIdAND [UserId] IS NULL AND [UserId] LIKE @UserId_Like AND [UserInfo] = @UserInfoAND [UserInfo] IS NULL AND [UserInfo] LIKE @UserInfo_Like AND [ReserveArea] = @ReserveAreaAND [ReserveArea] IS NULL AND [ReserveArea] LIKE @ReserveArea_Like AND [CreatedDate] = @CreatedDateAND [CreatedDate] IS NULL AND [CreatedDate] LIKE @CreatedDate_Like AND [EndDate] = @EndDateAND [EndDate] IS NULL AND [EndDate] LIKE @EndDate_Like
